title: Twistie-Wear
description: "Twistie-Wear" - Selfies using your watch. How difficult is it to press the round button on your camera in landscape mode to take a selfie/group-shot using your large phones? It is easy now with Twistie1. Install Twistie App 2. Open "Twistie-Wear" phone app to take a selfie or group-shot3. Rotate/Twist your watch to take a Selfie.
descriptionHTML:
"Twistie-Wear" - Selfies using your watch. How difficult is it to press the round button on your camera in landscape mode to take a selfie/group-shot using your large phones? It is easy now with Twistie

1. Install Twistie App
2. Open "Twistie-Wear" phone app to take a selfie or group-shot
3. Rotate/Twist your watch to take a Selfie.
comments: Neat Great app. Needs a means to adjust sensitivity. I read complaints that people can't get it to work. On my g watch r, it is too sensitive. Can barely move the watch without it firing. Figure a way to calibrate it, and it is 5 stars.

Does what it says After the original version not working on SW3 the update does. A much simpler way to take a selfie. I'd love to see the option to be able to switch to the main camera for better quality images.
Miss this app since moving to the Samsung Gear S3 Frontier
Twist karo I use 5.5 inch oneplus and sometimes I find it difficult to click the button to take a selfie in landscape, now i can do it using my smart watch. Wow!! Its so easy. I loved it.
Awesome idea It just solves my problem of landscape selfies and it created a purpose for my moto360
recentChanges: Changed Sensitivity of Twist recognition. Now Twists will be detected more easily
